mapper.insert: insert into info_board(category, title, url, start, end, user_id) values (#{category}, #{title}, #{url}, #{start}, #{end}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: select * from info_board order by bno desc;
mapper.update: update info_board set title = #{title}, url = #{url}, start = #{start}, end = #{end}, regdate = current_timestamp where bno = #{bno}
